fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Prize 27,836
fields.bodyText: Across 1,4 police record double/cryptic def [1979 record by The Police] 9 snob pretentiouS NOBility (hidden + &Lit) 10 apprentice APP(eal)/R(omeo)/ENTICE 11 coryza O in CRAZY (anag) 12 innuendo INN + ON DUE (anag) 13 Cambridge C(ame)/AMBRIDGE [The Archers village] 15 Zeus ZE/US 16 Hope/hope Bob Hope/hope locked in Pandora’s box 17 thesaurus cryptic def 21 egotistic GO in CITIES (anag) 22 UNESCO jUNE SCOtland 24 Prometheus ME in PRO THE US 26 halter H  ER [kind of top] 27 Sydney (couple)S/(happily)Y/(marrie)D/(o)N/(th)E/(tell)Y Down 1 Pandora P AND/OR A 2 lobby LO/B(a)BY 3 chapati CHAP + (f)A(t)/(i)T(s)/(h)I(s) 5 exeunt EX + TUNE (anag) 6 on the menu NOT (anag) + HE-MEN/(yo)U 7 decades DECADE(nt)S [New Testament] 8 spring chicken SPRING + CHICKEN 14,25 baptismal font BATMAN’S PLOT IF (anag) 16 Hogarth H(ooked)/O(n)/G(in)  H(is) 18 squishy SQUI(d)/SHY 19 uncanny U(niform)/N  ANNY 20 statue S(i)TUATE(d) (anag) 23 elfin F(emale) in NILE (rev)
